title: SEC insists on U.S. deposition for detained Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon
description:
The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is seeking to depose Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon in the U.S. by Oct. 13, according to a legal filing reviewed by CryptoSlate. This comes despite Kwon currently being detained in Montenegro pending potential extradition. Kwon’s legal team argues it is impossible for him to appear for a deposition in […]

The post SEC insists on U.S. deposition for detained Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon appeared first on CryptoSlate.
